text:
Tell me if this chance is all I have
This is what I ask myself
Cause it's all or nothing when you're so alone
I have never given up my hope
Let the music take me high
What you think you like is best
Go on your day
This is my war, I need to fight
I struggle more, to see it through
We will always see the last time and then it's time to go
This is my war, I need to fight
I struggle more, to see it through
You can show us everything you feel
Before we leave
Before we walk down the line
Before we leave
I will give you my word
Before we leave
Before we walk down the line
Before we leave
Believe
Tell me if this chance is all I have
This is what I ask myself
Cause it's all or nothing when you're on your own
I have never given up my hope
Let the music take me high
What you think you like is best
Go on your day
This is my war, I need to fight
I struggle more, to see it through
We will always see the last time and then it's time to go
This is my war, I need to fight
I struggle more, to see it through
You can show us everything you feel
Before we leave
Before we walk down the line
Before we leave
I will give you my word
Before we leave
Before we walk down the line
Before we leave
Believe
This is my war
This is my war
This is my war
trans:
Dites-moi si cette chance est tout ce qui me reste
C’est ce que je me demande
Parce que c'est tout ou rien quand on est si seul
Je n'ai jamais perdu espoir
Que la musique m'emporte
Ce que vous pensez aimer est le meilleur
Poursuivez votre journée
C'est ma guerre, je dois me battre
Je lutte davantage pour aller jusqu'au bout
Nous nous verrons la dernière fois, puis il sera temps de partir.
C'est ma guerre, je dois me battre
Je lutte davantage pour aller jusqu'au bout
Vous pouvez nous montrer tout ce que vous ressentez
Avant de partir
Avant que nous marchions sur le chemin
Avant de partir
Je vous donne ma parole
Avant de partir
Avant que nous marchions sur le chemin
Avant de partir
Croyez
